Class PersistenceCache

java.lang.Object
krystal.framework.core.cache.PersistenceCache
All Implemented Interfaces:
TasksSchedulerInterface
public abstract class PersistenceCache extends Object implements TasksSchedulerInterface
Abstract class for creating and managing custom caches (Collections and Maps) of PersistenceInterface objects.
